file_intent: Express route handlers for user management (admin & auth) in REST API

responsibility_blocks.description: List users with pagination and admin auth
responsibility_blocks.label: User listing and pagination

responsibility_blocks.description: Fetch a user by ID with validation and error handling
responsibility_blocks.label: Single user retrieval

responsibility_blocks.description: Validate input, check uniqueness, hash password, create user
responsibility_blocks.label: User creation

responsibility_blocks.description: Validate input, authorization checks, dynamic field updates
responsibility_blocks.label: User update

responsibility_blocks.description: Admin-restricted deletion of user by ID
responsibility_blocks.label: User deletion
